      • createTool

        public PDFViewCtrl.Tool createTool(int mode,
                          PDFViewCtrl ctrl,
                          PDFViewCtrl.Tool current_tool)
        Creates the specified tool and copies the necessary info from the previous tool if provided.
        Specified by:
        createTool in interface PDFViewCtrl.ToolManager
        Parameters:
        mode - the identifier for the tool to be created.
        ctrl - the PDFViewCtrl that calls this method.
        current_tool - the current tool in PDFViewCtrl before this this called.
